data.name: Batman Dark knight
Dark-Zhihu
data.description: 目前暂时是ASC_8384 基于Dark zhihu LePtC mod(version:2018.02.20) 修改而成，对作者表示感谢。 CC0 协议赛高！ 喜欢的话，请在评论里给好评，顺便去GitHub 里点个star，谢谢！ 有不足之处的话，为了便于反馈，请在我的GitHub 里提issue，谢谢！

data.name: Wanikani: Forum Transparency 2.0
data.description:
This is the new version of the transparent theme for our beloved Wanikani forums. It makes the forums prettier and allows you to use your own background image (or color).
You can find the old one on its forum page, or on its userstyles.org page.
For bug reports or suggestions, please contact me either on the forums or through my email address. These are provided below.
Forums: https://community.wanikani.com/t/userstyle-forum-transparency-20/32287 Email: kumi@kumirei.com

You can find the changelog below.

data.name: Discordama EX
data.description:
/!\ Please note that is an early access version and does not represent the final form of Discordama EX. For quicker and further development, all suggestions and feedback are welcome and can be done by sending a DM to one of us. (@Aligator#9999 or @Ag#5896)
Expect bugs, unfinished and not-yet started features.

Experience the wonderful Discord layout in KoGaMa! (Name is a working title)
    Design inspired by Discord

data.description: a dark mode for beuth moodle Please contact me for any suggestions or if you like the theme and use it. Bitte kontaktiere mich für Verbesserungsvorschläge, oder wenn dir das Theme gefällt und du es benutzt.

data.name: bilibili-theme 深色模式 暗黑模式 b站主题
Custom Pillowfort Theme
data.description: Changes the default theme for the blogging/social media website PillowFort. By default, the custom theme is an array of pinks, but it can be customized with user-selected colors. This will customize almost every page on the site, except for user blogs/profiles.

data.name: Большое окно стикеров
data.description: Увеличивает окно стикеров. К сожалению смайлики растягиваются только скриптом
